page.title: 10LONGBOROUGH SCHOOL 1
page.content: Longborough C.E. Primary School serves the area around Longborough, Sezincote,Waverton Stud & Condicote.The number on roll in July 1985 was 38; 15 juniors aged 7-11 & 23 infants aged 4-7.The juniors are housed in the original Victorian building containing 2 classrooms but the infants are housed in a 6 year old Vic Hallam classroom situated on the playing field.The school has its own kitchen, playing field & playground & its position is in the centre of the village. The teaching entitlement is 2.2.Mr.C. Williams is the teaching head, Mrs. S. Bell is the infant teacher & Mrs.S. Durston is the part-time teacher.There is also special needs provision.Non- teaching staff consists of a cleaner in charge, a clerical assistant & a midday supervisory assistant.
